title: Oops! Mr.Superstar Hit on Me
overview: Thailand's top superstar, nicknamed "The Breath of Asia", Ton Nareubet accidentally shares a meaningful bonding night with Cake, a college student intern 20 years his junior. He mistakes her for a callgirl his best friend sends over, when in fact, Cake is just there to ask for his autograph for her mother Kanda who is a big fan. After the fateful night, Ton tries to get in touch with Cake to take responsibility by asking his nephew and manager Nadol to contact her. But believing Cake is just a social climber looking for an easy life by sleeping with celebrity, Nadol never reaches out. Things escalate when Cake's best friend, Now, out of anger on her friend's behalf, posts on her social media about a celebrity with the initial "T.N." who knocks a girl up and bails. The media is quick to pick up on the story and the whole thing turns into a big scandal. Now Ton rushes to get in touch with Cake, wanting to start over as a couple. How will this relationship with obstacles more than just age difference turn out?
